text: granthajnanam gala okatanu ila annadu: "Nenu kanureppapatu kalanlo danini ni vaddaku tegalanu!" A taruvata (sulaiman) danini vastavanga tana mundu pettabadi undatanni cusi ila annadu: "Idi na prabhuvu anugraham. Nenu krtajnatalu cupuduna leka krtaghnuda navuduna ani pariksincataniki ila ceyabadindi. Krtajnatalu telipevadu, niscayanga, tana melu korake krtajnatalu telupukuntadu. Kani evadaina krtaghnataku palpadite, niscayanga, na prabhuvu svayam samrd'dhudu, parama data (ani telusukovali)
